headline: MRL INDUSTRIES FURNACE TUBE
specstable:
Manufacturer MRL Industries
Model 400-902959
Maximum Temperature 1,200 ºC (2,192 ºF, 1,473 ºK)
Other Information Zones: 3, center zone has 3 sections
Load zone: 10.00" long, 2.3 KW, 240 volt.
Center zone: 36.00" long, 5.4 KW, 240 volt.
Source zone: 10.00" long, 2.3 KW, 240 volt.
3" Refractory opening, 5" I.D.
Thermocouples not included.
See furnace diagram in "other images" link 5
All heater elements have individual connection terminals, diagram shown is for rated voltage and power
Exterior Dimensions
Width 14.000 in (35.6 cm)
Height 64.000 in (162.6 cm)
Weight 88 lb (40 kg)
